Name: Dubliner Cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: A Manhattan variation calling for Irish whiskey instead of bourbon or rye, mixed with equal parts sweet vermouth, orange liqueur and a dash of orange bitters - respectfully Regan's Orange Bitters .
History: Adapted from a recipe by Gary 'gaz' Regan in 1999 in New York, USA for St. Patrick's Day that year.
Nutrition: One serving of Dubliner Cocktail contains 194 calories
